MAN.TITLE: add_help_chapter
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Add an entry in the helps list

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : a character string, the help chapter title
: a character string, the path of the directory containing the help files.

DESCRIPTION.P: This function adds a new entry in the helps list. The help chapter files are to be located in a single directory. If the given title already exists in the helps list associated with the same path nothing is done. The function checks if the directory exist.

MAN.AUTHOR: Serge Steer , INRIA
